name: Open Tracks, Build Your Own Track.
name_original: Open Tracks, Build Your Own Track.
description:
Open Tracks, An open world racing game where you build your tracks in a city like manner.

You get 11 Tracks, of which 2 of them are pre-made for showcase. You can edit the tracks add Buildings and more in the future.

I made this game in 4 days, so expect some bugs and glitches. There is no music in this version. I might update the game in the future with lots of new stuff.

If you want to stay updated follow me on Twitter @FuminoStudios

- Future Plans -

- New Gamemodes

   - Time Trial

   - Racing (with bots)

   - Coin Collectathon 

   - Chase

- PowerUps 

   - Speed Boost

   - Rocket launcher

   - Gun

   - Grappling Hook

- More Buildings

   - Houses (Lots of Varients)

   - Side walk

   - Crossroad

   - Zebra Crossing

   - Street Lights

   - Street Barriers

- And Loads more.

But I need funds, so please Support me and this project by joining my Patreon
